Location:
- Kitchen â€“ electric range with smooth glass-ceramic cooktop and rear control panel

Observations:
- Freestanding electric range; four radiant elements (one dual-ring)
- Digital display/controls with side knobs; painted drywall backsplash
- Cookware present on right-front burner area
- Cooktop shows light smudges/residue from use

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Clean glass cooktop with non-abrasive cleaner; inspect closely for any scratches/chips after cleaning
- Verify range anti-tip bracket is installed and engaged (not visible from this photo)
- Test all burners/oven and indicator lights for proper operation
